'''Helmets''' are a kind of head [[armour]] that have 1 base [[AC]], and which may be [[scroll of enchant armour|enchanted]] up to +2. They may only be worn by small- or medium-[[size]]d adventurers without [[horns]], [[antennae]], or a [[beak]]. All others must resign themselves to wearing [[hat]]s.

Helmets can have the following egos:
*[[Intelligence]] (+3)
*[[See invisible]]

==History==
*Prior to [[0.19]], you could find hats with [[cold resistance|cold]] and [[fire resistance]] egos in [[ice cave]]s and [[volcano]]es.
*Prior to [[0.14]], helmets came in the following descriptive varieties: winged, horned, crested, plumed, spiked, or visored. These descriptions changed the tile used to represent the helmet but had no other in-game effect.
